thread.title: Abu Dhabi Tawteen, HCT launch employment improvement project
thread.title_full: Abu Dhabi Tawteen, HCT launch employment improvement project | MENAFN.COM

title: Abu Dhabi Tawteen, HCT launch employment improvement project
text:
(MENAFN) The Abu Dhabi Tawteen Council (ADTC) and the Higher Colleges of Technology (HCT) are set to inaugurate a new online project to boost employment in the emirate, Emirates News Agency reported.

The scheme will help fresh graduates in integrating their skills to correspond with the labor market in Abu Dhabi. Specifically, they will gain valuable knowledge of the most prominent employers and requirements.

"The Mustaqbali system reduces the gap between higher education outputs and the future needs of the labour market and higher education inputs," Vice Chancellor of the HCT said.
